message.body: Hey are you grabbing the mixer? We're ready to set all the posts, but we'll unload the van so the mixer can fit
We were just going to use that mixing pan. It's only 2-3 bags per hole. I didn't get the mixer last night so gotta use that pan.
It's 4hrs of back and forth and setting it up and breaking it down. Waste of time.
Ok we still need the concrete
Correction: half of company stuff is $2983.00
Leaving a credit to you of $2878
I'm a drop a ambalance on him

Hey I didn't realize the table saw wasn't in the van until just now. I need it at 830. Also stainless screws at lowes were $14 for a pound. I got 3 lbs but if you go to c&r I bet u can get a big box for a lot cheaper. But I also need those shortly after 830
Table saw was in the van yesterday.
It should be in there. Was there a break in?
But I'm pretty positive it was locked this morning. Nothing else appears to be missing. Let me see if Adam unloaded it yesterday for some reason
Brian grabbed it. It's at my place. I can bring it by but I can't get there until 9.
